# The `OperandsMapper` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper class used to get/create the virtual registers that will be used to replace the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> when applying a mapping. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::RegisterBankInfo::OperandsMapper</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

Helper class used to get/create the virtual registers that will be used to replace the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> when applying a mapping.

## Public Member Functions

### createVRegs() {#a6817453b853abea76fab37803ade6ef4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegisterBankInfo::OperandsMapper::createVRegs (unsigned OpIdx)">
Create as many new virtual registers as needed for the mapping of the <code>OpIdx-th</code> operand.

The number of registers is determined by the number of breakdown for the related operand in the instruction mapping. The type of the new registers is a plain scalar of the right size. The proper type is expected to be set when the mapping is applied to the instruction(s) that realizes the mapping.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<a href="#a397c999d8b2ead3f13eba866dfc3295e">getMI()</a>.getOperand(OpIdx).<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsinstprinter-cpp/#a85e8dc708ae90b1129b892cb8ae1500f">isReg()</a>
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
All the partial mapping of the <code>OpIdx-th</code> operand have been assigned a new virtual register.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00351">351</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbankinfo-cpp/#l00711">711</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbankinfo-cpp">RegisterBankInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getVRegs() {#af23faa9ae580c4a451da006e3567b297}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>iterator&#95;range&lt; SmallVectorImpl&lt; Register &gt;::const&#95;iterator &gt; RegisterBankInfo::OperandsMapper::getVRegs (unsigned OpIdx, bool ForDebug=false) const</>}>
Get all the virtual registers required to map the <code>OpIdx-th</code> operand of the instruction.

This return an empty range when createVRegs or setVRegs has not been called. The iterator may be invalidated by a call to setVRegs or createVRegs.

When <code>ForDebug</code> is true, we will not check that the list of new virtual registers does not contain uninitialized values.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<a href="#a397c999d8b2ead3f13eba866dfc3295e">getMI()</a>.getOperand(OpIdx).<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsinstprinter-cpp/#a85e8dc708ae90b1129b892cb8ae1500f">isReg()</a>
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
ForDebug || All partial mappings have been set a register
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00378">378</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbankinfo-cpp/#l00746">746</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerbankinfo-cpp">RegisterBankInfo.cpp</a>.

### OpToNewVRegIdx {#a4bb5eaa667d20a46b47e088341a889ed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;int, 8&gt; llvm::RegisterBankInfo::OperandsMapper::OpToNewVRegIdx</>}>
The OpIdx-th cell contains the index in NewVRegs where the VRegs of the OpIdx-th operand starts.

-1 means we do not have such mapping yet. Note: We use a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> to avoid heap allocation for most cases.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h/#l00285">285</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerbankinfo-h">RegisterBankInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
